title: Swiss Bank hasn’t revealed that the Congress President has stashed 34 lakh crore rupees with them
subtitle: Swiss Bank hasn’t made any revelations that the present Congress President Sonia Gandhi has stashed 34 lakh crore rupees with them
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A piece of news that the Swiss Bank has said that there are 34 lakh crores in the account of the present Congress President is doing rounds on social media widely. Let’s try to check the veracity of the claim made in the post.



Claim: Swiss Bank has revealed that there are 34 lakh crore rupees in the account of the present Congress President. Fact: Swiss Bank hasn’t made any such revelation that the present Congress President Sonia Gandhi has stashed 34 lakh crore rupees with them. Nothing substantial was found to support the claim. So, the claim is FALSE.

Sonia Gandhi is the current President of the Congress party. When googled to check if the Swiss bank has made any revelation about Sonia Gandhi stashing money with them, no results with relevant information were obtained.

If the Swiss bank has really made such revelation, they would have been reported by all the major newspapers and channels in India. But no news agency has reported anything about Swiss bank revealing about Sonia Gandhi stashing money with them. So, the news circulating on social media is baseless.

To conclude, the Swiss Bank hasn’t said that the Congress President has stashed 34 lakh crore rupees with them.
